For further details on these charges, see Note 22. Deconsolidation of RBH. [2] Includes deconsolidation of RBH cash and cash equivalents of $1,323 million and restricted cash of $23 million. [3] The amounts for cash and cash equivalents shown above include restricted cash of $4 million, $27 million and $29 million as of December 31, 2019, 2018 and 2017, respectively, which were included in other current assets in the consolidated balance sheets.
